Text: If my memory serves me correctly, this guy was severely hit by occultism and New Age. He has though met his maker, in his case, Satan.
Some Christians are SO naive, ignorant, closed minded, judgemental... and yes, stupid.  Joseph Campbell was not satanic.  But anything that isn't Christian is wrong, right?

Maybe those that are seclusive and exclusive creating further separation are operating in a devilish way. Those that seek inclusion and acceptance are operating in a loving way. Which might mean that those that condemn others that not like themselves in the name of Christianity are NOT the purest of us all. But perhaps the foulest...
If joseph Campbell was an evil man then humanity is truly, truly a lost cause. wow the Christian cult is one of the most astounding of them all.
